summary: This is an email chain forwarding a civil complaint filed against Jeffrey Epstein. It involves communication between a paralegal at a law firm and federal agents, noting the case is assigned to Judge Marra and references a prior motion regarding Epstein's computers.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the civil complaint being forwarded in the email chain.

persons.name: Judge Marra
persons.context: Identified as the judge assigned to the civil action and who was supposed to hear a motion regarding Epstein's computers.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney
persons.context: Mentioned in the email chain as a recipient or sender of the forwarded message.

persons.name: Anne Marie Giri
persons.context: Paralegal at Herman & Mermelstein, P.A. who sent the original email attaching the civil complaint against Jeffrey Epstein to a federal agent.

persons.name: Mr. Herman
persons.context: Attorney at Herman & Mermelstein, P.A. identified as the contact for questions regarding the filed complaint.

connections.description: Giri is a paralegal at the law firm Herman & Mermelstein, P.A., where Herman is an attorney.
Giri, representing her law firm, is communicating the filing of a civil action against Epstein.
Herman's law firm has filed a civil complaint against Epstein.
Judge Marra is assigned to preside over the civil action against Epstein and a prior related motion.

events.title: Civil complaint filed against Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: A civil action complaint against Jeffrey Epstein is filed in US District Court and assigned to Judge Marra.

events.title: Motion regarding Epstein's computers
events.description: A prior motion concerning Jeffrey Epstein's computers was supposed to be heard by Judge Marra.

keyFacts: A civil complaint was filed against Jeffrey Epstein in US District Court on or before January 24, 2008.
The case was assigned to Judge Marra, who was also slated to hear a motion regarding Epstein's computers.
The law firm Herman & Mermelstein, P.A., via paralegal Anne Marie Giri, notified federal agents of the filing.
The email indicates coordination or notification between private civil attorneys and federal law enforcement agents involved in the Epstein case.
The document references a prior legal proceeding involving a motion about Epstein's computers.
